amendment.description: Amendment increases funding (by offset) for the Urban Search and Rescue Response System by $7.667 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce funds for the Office of the Under Secretary for Management by $7,667,000 and increase funds for the Urban Search and Rescue Response System by $7,667,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Grimm amendment (A007) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Grimm amendment (A007) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A007) offered by Mr. Grimm.
